name: Lightspeed Stampede
description:
Made for the 8 Bits to Infinity Run Jam, with the theme Gravity:

https://itch.io/jam/runjam

Zip around space and bend gravity to your will with an awesome astronaut gravity gun. Use your toolset to race around 12 special space race courses. Can you complete each level as fast as possible and earn all the stars?

Controls:

Left click to switch gravity to a different asteroid

Right click to send a blast of energy that propels you

Esc or E to pause

Credits:

ChunkyPotatoSoup (Programming/Art)

aprzn123 (Music)

Sound effects provided by opengameart.org:

https://opengameart.org/content/60-cc0-sci-fi-sfx

https://opengameart.org/content/countdown-voiceover-robotic

https://opengameart.org/content/25-cc0-bang-firework-sfx
